fullSpecDrivenDevelopment.description: Complete spec-driven development workflow for a new feature

inputs.initialRequirements: Add comprehensive analytics dashboard showing user behavior, engagement metrics, and performance insights. Users should be able to filter by date range, export reports, and set up automated alerts.

qualityChecklist.description: Generate and validate quality checklist for a specification

userStories.journey: As a user, I want to send real-time messages to other users so that I can communicate instantly

acceptance.when: User types a message and presses send
acceptance.then: Message appears instantly in both sender and recipient chat windows

brownfieldFeature.description: Add new feature to existing application

inputs.featureDescription: Add optional two-factor authentication using TOTP (Time-based One-Time Password). Users should be able to enable/disable 2FA in their account settings, and will be prompted for a code after password login when enabled.

inputs.initialRequirements: Cross-platform mobile app for tracking workouts, nutrition, and progress. Users can log exercises, meals, weight, and view charts showing trends over time. Social features allow sharing achievements with friends.
constraints: Must work offline with sync when online

inputs.initialRequirements: Microservice handling email, SMS, and push notifications. Accepts notification requests via REST API and message queue, handles templating, tracks delivery status, implements retry logic, and provides webhook callbacks for delivery events.
constraints: Support multiple email and SMS providers

refactoringWithSpecs.description: Use specs to guide major refactoring

inputs.featureDescription: Refactor monolithic payment processing code into modular architecture supporting multiple payment providers (Stripe, PayPal, Square). Extract provider-specific logic, create unified interface, add proper error handling, and improve testability.

testing.approach: Integration tests with test payment providers

security.sensitiveData: Never log full card numbers or CVV

inputs.initialRequirements: AI-powered feature that analyzes uploaded documents and generates concise summaries. Supports PDF, Word, and text files up to 50 pages. Users can adjust summary length (brief/detailed) and get key points extracted. Summaries are stored and can be regenerated with different settings.
constraints: Processing time < 30 seconds for typical document
complianceRequirements: No sensitive data sent to external APIs without encryption
